statements: SELECT * FROM BatchTracking;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM BatchTracking;
SELECT batch_id, product_name FROM BatchTracking WHERE supplier_name='Supplier1';
SELECT * FROM BatchTracking WHERE batch_id=100;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS TotalBatches FROM BatchTracking GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM BatchTracking WHERE supplier_name='ABC Suppliers' AND product_name='Product A';
SELECT batch_id, supplier_name FROM BatchTracking WHERE product_name='Product B' ORDER BY batch_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM BatchTracking ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_batches FROM BatchTracking;
SELECT * FROM BatchTracking WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'Supplier%' AND product_name LIKE '%C' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_id FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(product_id) FROM Product GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 1;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name FROM Supplier INNER JOIN Product ON Supplier.supplier_id = Product.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM Product INNER JOIN Supplier ON Product.supplier_id = Supplier.supplier_id
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM Supplier LEFT JOIN Product ON Supplier.supplier_id = Product.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT * FROM Product ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM Product JOIN Supplier USING (supplier_id)
SELECT * FROM Batch;
SELECT product_id, production_date FROM Batch;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) FROM Batch GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM Supplier WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM Batch WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT batch_id, product_id, supplier_id FROM Batch ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name FROM Product p JOIN Supplier s ON p.product_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT b.batch_id, b.production_date, p.product_name FROM Batch b LEFT JOIN Product p ON b.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Batch WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A');
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Batches WHERE batch_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY batch_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, batch_number FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id INNER JOIN Batches ON Products.product_id = Batches.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location='New York';
SELECT p.product_name, p.product_price, s.supplier_name FROM Products p JOIN Suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT b.batch_id, b.batch_number, b.batch_date, p.product_name FROM Batches b JOIN Products p ON b.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY batch_date ASC;
SELECT t.*, b.batch_number FROM Traceability t JOIN Batches b ON t.batch_id = b.batch_id WHERE t.trace_details LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY t.trace_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM batches
SELECT product_id, supplier_id FROM batches WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT batch_id, product_id, manufacturing_date FROM batches WHERE supplier_id = 'S001' ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC
SELECT * FROM batches WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31' AND product_id = 'P002'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_batches FROM batches
SELECT * FROM batches WHERE product_id = 'P1' ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC, expiration_date ASC
SELECT batch_id, supplier_id, manufacturing_date FROM batches WHERE supplier_id = 'S1' ORDER BY manufacturing_date
SELECT * FROM batches WHERE supplier_id = 'S2' AND expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY batch_id
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_batches FROM batches GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_batches DESC
SELECT * FROM batches WHERE manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01' AND expiration_date < '2023-01-01'
